snippet: In the sting, one of hundreds of similar operations, an undercover federal agent in California offered the defendants a chance to steal cocaine from an imaginary “stash house.”
abstract: Panel of Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals in California reinstates criminal indictments of two men who were caught in drug-and-gun sting operation; overturns district court ruling that federal agents had engaged in illegal conduct.
lead_paragraph: In the sting, one of hundreds of similar operations, an undercover federal agent in California offered the defendants a chance to steal cocaine from an imaginary “stash house.”

headline.main: Federal Appeals Court Reinstates Indictments in a Drug-and-Gun Sting
headline.print_headline: Federal Appeals Court Reinstates Indictments in a Drug-and-Gun Sting

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
